name: Root Invasion
description:
Destroy the root of all evil in this chaotic third person shooter!

The root of all evil has overtaken the vegetable garden, converting perfectly good vegetables into minions of darkness. 

Punch down the corrupted vegetables, use them as a weapon or eat them to survive each wave.

Can you undo the root's twisted energy or will you succumb to its dark powers?


Credits Emanuele ArdolinoProducerTom BaasSystem Design / Animation / RiggingJénilson Martins da SilvaCharacter Controller / AudioMathias LarsenLevel DesignIbrahim El AmraniAI / Enemy DesignPeter JanssenWeapon Design / UI Tech Support / Set DressingJenny LoikkanenCharacter Design / RiggingDenise BruinUI DesignSophie DapperensSpawning System / ObjectiveTom HeesakkersProp Artist

This prototype was made during a Game Jam in 5 days by students from Breda University of Applied Sciences.
